{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR340G |revision=v4.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/30/2007 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR340G |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=CFeon |fla1_model=F16-100HIP |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8236 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=E00:05:C5 |oui_eth=E00:05:C5 }} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR340G TL-WR340G product page]
*Same as the TL-WR340GD aside from the antenna configuration. :The TL-WR340G has an integral antenna. :The TL-WR340GD has a RP-SMA connector.
